title: Best champion to carry with?
body:
In your opinions which top/jungle is the best champion to carry with
Wait, nvm *second* best champ to carry with {{champion:6}} is the best

replies.body: Your best champ can carry you
Are you talking about {{champion:254}} or the build :P

For top, the best champion to carry with is Riven {{champion:92}} or Fiora{{champion:114}}. 
These two champions have one thing in common; when they are fed; it is practically impossible to stop them. Riven's high burst and CC makes her great for peeling the ADC, as well, she can easily 2 v 1 even when not ahead with her ult.

Fiora's ult is absolutely terrifying with just a couple kills. It will force the enemy team to rush defensive items to deal with her.

In the Jungle, Vi{{champion:254}}, and J4 {{champion:59}} are excellent carry picks. They have % health damage in their kits and are AA based, so they will not fall off late game while being able to do damage despite building tanky. In addition, they come with a ton of mobility and CC to help snow ball their lanes. Their kits are also loaded with stats that significantly helps with clearing the jungle.

Ultimately, most champions in the roster can carry. However, those who are AA based (to proc on hit effects), with built in armor pen, % health damage, true damage, or magic damage on hit in their kits are the best.
